titleInfo.title: COMPACT LATTICE QED WITH WILSON FERMIONS

mods.abstract: We study the phase structure and the chiral limit of 4d compact lattice QED with Wilson fermions (both dynamical and quenched). We use the standard Wilson gauge action and also a modified one suppressing lattice artifacts. Different techniques and observables to locate the chiral limit are discussed.
